bibl.title: Locating Arabic Papyrology: Fiscal Politics in Medieval Egypt as a Test-Case for Setting Disciplinary Boundaries and Standards.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Werner Diem, Arabische Steuerquittungen des 8. bis 11. Jahrhunderts aus der Heidelberger Papyrussammlung und anderen Sammlungen = Documenta Arabica Antiqua. 5 (Wiesbaden, 2008). - Introduction. - Arabic tax-receipts on papyrus as a historical source. - Personal and geographical names in Arabic tax-receipts. - Corrections of readings of Arabic tax receipts.
bibl.seg: Petra M. Sijpesteijn, Locating Arabic Papyrology: Fiscal Politics in Medieval Egypt as a Test-Case for Setting Disciplinary Boundaries and Standards.
